name: AYUNTAMIENTO DE HUELVA - HUELVA CITY COUNCIL
goal:
Huelva City Council is the local public institution with competences, in terms of State and Autonomous Regions, in the subjects described in Article 25 of the Law 7/1985, dated April 2, which regulates the Basis of the Local Government Law, among which we can find:
·Planning, management, implementation and urban discipline; promotion and management of housings; parks and gardens, paving of public urban roads and maintenance of tracks and rural roads.
·Artistic-historical heritage.
·Environment protection.
·Providing social services and promotion of social reintegration.
·Water supply and street lighting; services of road cleaning, of waste collection and treatment, sewage and treatment of waste water.
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Regional Policy
euInitiatives:
-Youth Employment Initiative to support young people who are not in education, employment or training (NEETs).
-Employment, social affairs and social inclusion through the European Social Fund (ESF) to help people improve their work skills and job prospects.
-European Territorial Cooperation (ETC), which provides a framework for the implementation of joint actions and policy exchanges between national, regional and local actors.
-Integrated Urban Development Planning
and Urban Development Management –
Strategies and instruments for
sustainable urban development.
